column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We finally got to the hostess and we were advised that it's a 45 min wait but we could go ahead and order our pizzas so that it'll be ready by the time we're seated.  We were totally excited about this.  So
column2: placed our order at the counter and had to fight the crowd to get outside.  Man
column3: did I regret going outside.  It was freezing
column4: there was no place to sit and I tried going back inside
column5: but there just wasn't enough room.
